metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16470 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a possible DoS vulnerability in the multipart parser in Rack before 2.0.6. Specially crafted requests can cause the multipart parser to enter a pathological state, causing the parser to use CPU resources disproportionate to the request size.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
